The bus carrying pilgrims collided with a truck near Jamuniya forest, leaving several others injured. Authorities have been alerted, and efforts are underway to provide medical assistance to the injured, with concerns that the death toll may rise.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ranchi/jharkhand-accident-bus-carrying-kanwariyas-collides-with-truck-transporting-gas-cylinders-5-dead-several-injured/articleshow/122964810.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ranchi/jharkhand-accident-bus-carrying-kanwariyas-collides-with-truck-transporting-gas-cylinders-5-dead-several-injured/articleshow/122964810.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 08:33:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ASRP MUKESH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="86632" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122965115,imgsize-86632.cms"/></item><item><title>'Used furniture to block door': Witnesses recall terrifying moments during Manhattan shooting</title><description><![CDATA[A shooting in Midtown Manhattan resulted in the deaths of five people, including a police officer and the suspected gunman, Shane Tamura. The incident occurred inside an office building, reportedly housing Blackstone investment company, causing widespread panic as the shooter moved floor by floor. Police have contained the scene, confirming the shooter is dead, while investigations are underway.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/people-used-furniture-to-block-door-eyewitnesses-recall-terrifying-moments-during-manhattan-building-shooting-video-shows-chaotic-scenes/articleshow/122964078.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/people-used-furniture-to-block-door-eyewitnesses-recall-terrifying-moments-during-manhattan-building-shooting-video-shows-chaotic-scenes/articleshow/122964078.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 08:15:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1384977" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122964510,imgsize-1384977.cms"/></item><item><title>Denied chance to speak on Op Sindoor, Manish Tewari shares 'Bharat ki baat' post</title><description><![CDATA[​While sharing a news article on why Congress did not allow party MPs Shashi Tharoor and Tewari to speak in Lok Sabha, the Congress MP posted famous lyrics of the Hindi film "Poorab and Pashchim". "Hai preet jahaan ki reet sada, Main geet wahaan ke gaata hoon, Bharat ka rehne waala hoon,  Bharat ki baat sunata hoon," Tewari said in a post on X, adding, "Jai Hind."]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bharat-ki-baat-sunata-hoon-congress-vs-congress-manish-tewaris-cryptic-post-after-being-dropped-from-operation-sindoor-debate/articleshow/122965624.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bharat-ki-baat-sunata-hoon-congress-vs-congress-manish-tewaris-cryptic-post-after-being-dropped-from-operation-sindoor-debate/articleshow/122965624.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 10:18:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1337751" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122966252,imgsize-1337751.cms"/></item><item><title>Wankhede Stadium heist: IPL jerseys worth Rs 6.5L stolen from BCCI office; security guard held</title><description><![CDATA[A security guard at the BCCI office in Mumbai has been arrested for allegedly stealing 261 IPL jerseys, valued at Rs 6.52 lakh. Farooque Aslam Khan, the accused, reportedly sold the jerseys to an online dealer to fund his online gambling addiction.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/6-5l-ipl-jerseys-stolen-from-bcci-office-guard-held/articleshow/122958343.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/6-5l-ipl-jerseys-stolen-from-bcci-office-guard-held/articleshow/122958343.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 03:30:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>MATEEN HAFEEZ</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="118806" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122966203,imgsize-118806.cms"/></item><item><title>Delhi weather update: Heavy rain lashes capital; Air India warns of flight disruptions</title><description><![CDATA[Heavy rainfall lashed Delhi and the NCR region on Tuesday, causing widespread waterlogging and disrupting traffic during peak hours. The downpour, accompanied by thunderstorms and gusty winds, stranded commuters and affected flight operations, prompting advisories from Air India and Delhi Airport. The IMD forecasts continued rainfall, urging residents to stay alert.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/heavy-rainfall-disrupts-delhi-air-india-and-igi-airport-issue-travel-advisories/articleshow/122965653.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/heavy-rainfall-disrupts-delhi-air-india-and-igi-airport-issue-travel-advisories/articleshow/122965653.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 09:48:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1095079" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122965852,imgsize-1095079.cms"/></item><item><title>Accenture executive says AI can speed up work, but won’t raise productivity unless…</title><description><![CDATA[Artificial Intelligence tools can speed up tasks. However, Accenture's Ramine Tinati says it doesn't guarantee productivity. Companies need to redesign workflows for real gains. Some Asian firms are lagging in AI adoption. Tech giants like Amazon and Microsoft are investing heavily in AI. Nvidia's Jensen Huang and OpenAI's Sam Altman believe AI will change jobs.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/accenture-executive-says-ai-can-speed-up-work-but-wont-raise-productivity-unless/articleshow/122955662.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/accenture-executive-says-ai-can-speed-up-work-but-wont-raise-productivity-unless/articleshow/122955662.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 19:12:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30344" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122955661,imgsize-30344.cms"/></item><item><title>Gold price prediction: Where are gold rates headed ahead of US tariff deadline?</title><description><![CDATA[Gold price prediction: Gold prices are fluctuating within a range due to decreased demand for safe-haven assets as global economic uncertainties lessen with trade deals. The US-EU trade agreement, while criticized by some, has reduced market uncertainty. Investors are closely watching US-China trade talks and the upcoming FOMC decision for further direction, with a slightly bearish outlook for gold in the near term.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/gold-price-prediction-today-where-are-gold-rates-headed-on-july-29-2025-and-in-the-near-term-mcx-gold-donald-trump-tariff-deadline/articleshow/122964893.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/gold-price-prediction-today-where-are-gold-rates-headed-on-july-29-2025-and-in-the-near-term-mcx-gold-donald-trump-tariff-deadline/articleshow/122964893.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 10:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="62694" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122964919,imgsize-62694.cms"/></item><item><title>India playing XI: Kuldeep in the mix, Akash Deep likely to return; call on Bumrah soon</title><description><![CDATA[With the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy still alive and series on the line, India are expected to veer from its safety-first approach in the fifth Test, starting Thursday at The Oval, and go all-out for the kill to level the series. Bumrah's participation remains uncertain and the question marks over Shardul Thakur or Kuldeep Yadav persists. On the batting front, Dhruv Jurel replaces the injured Rishabh Pant.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/india-xi-for-fifth-test-kuldeep-yadav-in-the-mix-akash-deep-likely-to-return-call-on-jasprit-bumrah-soon/articleshow/122966057.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/india-xi-for-fifth-test-kuldeep-yadav-in-the-mix-akash-deep-likely-to-return-call-on-jasprit-bumrah-soon/articleshow/122966057.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 10:10:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SAHIL MALHOTRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="40192" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122966233,imgsize-40192.cms"/></item><item><title>Nimisha Priya case: Death sentence in Yemen not overturned? Despite U.S. restrictions, Huawei is becoming a key Chinese AI chip supplier. Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang acknowledged Huawei's progress and warned about the impact of U.S. curbs, suggesting Huawei could dominate if restrictions persist.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/chinese-company-banned-in-america-launches-rival-to-nvidias-most-advanced-chip-read-nvidia-ceo-jensen-huangs-warning/articleshow/122956208.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/chinese-company-banned-in-america-launches-rival-to-nvidias-most-advanced-chip-read-nvidia-ceo-jensen-huangs-warning/articleshow/122956208.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 19:51:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="52102" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122956203,imgsize-52102.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: The swordsman vs The showman – Jadeja or Stokes, who stands taller?</title><description><![CDATA[The Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy series highlights the contrasting yet compelling rivalry between Ben Stokes and Ravindra Jadeja. While Stokes is celebrated for his match-winning performances in high-pressure situations, Jadeja's consistent all-round contributions often go unnoticed. Despite Stokes' impactful bowling in the series, Jadeja's superior batting and overall value have sparked debate about who is the better all-rounder.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-the-swordsman-vs-the-showman-ravindra-jadeja-or-ben-stokes-who-stands-taller/articleshow/122965055.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-the-swordsman-vs-the-showman-ravindra-jadeja-or-ben-stokes-who-stands-taller/articleshow/122965055.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 09:24:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PRANAV SHUKLA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43826" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122965601,imgsize-43826.cms"/></item><item><title>Himachal rain fury: Mandi flash flood kills 3; Chandigarh–Manali highway blocked</title><description><![CDATA[A flash flood in Mandi town, triggered by a cloudburst, has claimed at least three lives and caused extensive damage to houses and vehicles. The Chandigarh-Manali highway is blocked due to landslides, exacerbating the situation. Rescue operations are underway as authorities assess the full extent of the devastation, with one person still missing.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/shimla/himachal-pradesh-rain-fury-2-dead-2-missing-after-mandi-experiences-heavy-rainfall-several-roads-blocked/articleshow/122964134.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/shimla/himachal-pradesh-rain-fury-2-dead-2-missing-after-mandi-experiences-heavy-rainfall-several-roads-blocked/articleshow/122964134.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 07:39:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ROHIT MULLICK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="51048" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122964726,imgsize-51048.cms"/></item><item><title>Hit and run: Thar driver reverses to target elderly after minor collision in Jammu; flees</title><description><![CDATA[In Jammu, a young man, Manan Anand, has been booked for allegedly hitting an elderly man after their vehicles collided. The intense final saw Divya, playing with black pieces, triumph in a rapid tie-break. Amidst the drama, an untouched banana served as her quirky companion, a constant presence throughout her victorious journey.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/chess-the-banana-survives-in-batumi-india-gets-its-first-ever-womens-world-cup-champion-in-divya-deshmukh/articleshow/122964696.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/chess-the-banana-survives-in-batumi-india-gets-its-first-ever-womens-world-cup-champion-in-divya-deshmukh/articleshow/122964696.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 08:30:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>JYOTIRMOY HALDER</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45288" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122964736,imgsize-45288.cms"/></item><item><title>Engineer jumps to death from Pune office building; leaves heartbreaking note</title><description><![CDATA[In Pune, a 23-year-old mechanical engineer died after jumping from his office building. The incident happened in Hinjewadi. The engineer worked for a technology company. Police recovered a note from the body. The note suggested personal struggles. He was from Nashik and had been working at the company for a year.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/pune/have-failed-in-everything-engineer-jumps-to-death-from-pune-office-building-leaves-heartbreaking-note/articleshow/122965967.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/pune/have-failed-in-everything-engineer-jumps-to-death-from-pune-office-building-leaves-heartbreaking-note/articleshow/122965967.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 09:54:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="453264" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122966066,imgsize-453264.cms"/></item><item><title>US may axe OPT, threatening Indian students: Can America’s tech sector absorb shock? What it means</title><description><![CDATA[A Republican-led bill, H.R. 2315, aims to eliminate the OPT programme, jeopardising post-study work rights for international students—especially Indians, who dominate STEM-OPT participation. Critics call it a “job theft” loophole, but data shows OPT fuels U.S. innovation, university funding, and tech firms. Killing it could gut America’s global talent pipeline—and its competitive edge.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/america-may-scrap-opt-putting-indian-talent-at-risk-can-the-us-tech-economy-survive-the-blow/articleshow/122964395.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/america-may-scrap-opt-putting-indian-talent-at-risk-can-the-us-tech-economy-survive-the-blow/articleshow/122964395.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 08:04:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="40622" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122964373,imgsize-40622.cms"/></item><item><title>'At Lord's, the same happened' - Nasser Hussain reveals how Stokes fires up Archer</title><description><![CDATA[England captain Ben Stokes' leadership, especially his handling of Jofra Archer, has garnered praise amidst the ongoing Test series against India. The woman befriended the victim on a dating app before luring him to a house where the gang accused him of drug use.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/six-held-in-bengaluru-for-extorting-rs-2-lakh-from-techie-in-honeytrap/articleshow/122958339.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/six-held-in-bengaluru-for-extorting-rs-2-lakh-from-techie-in-honeytrap/articleshow/122958339.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 03:35:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="604486" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122964131,imgsize-604486.cms"/></item><item><title>Zach Evans retires at 24: Early NFL exit caps career earnings under $1M; Former Jets RB walks away despite promise </title><description><![CDATA[Zach Evans, a promising sixth-round pick in the 2023 NFL Draft, has retired at 24 with only $920,832 in career earnings. Drafted by the Rams, he later joined the Jets but ultimately stepped away from the league before training camp. His early exit highlights the financial uncertainties of short-lived professional sports careers, despite a promising college performance.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/zach-evans-net-worth-in-2025-early-nfl-exit-caps-career-earnings-under-1-million-after-surprise-retirement-with-jets/articleshow/122964181.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/zach-evans-net-worth-in-2025-early-nfl-exit-caps-career-earnings-under-1-million-after-surprise-retirement-with-jets/articleshow/122964181.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 08:30:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="40808" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122964178,imgsize-40808.cms"/></item><item><title>'Most influential of last decade': Former IND head coach Ravi Shastri singles out ex-India captain</title><description><![CDATA[Ravi Shastri has praised Virat Kohli, calling him the most influential player of the last decade. Shastri, the former India head coach, made the statement in a recent video on X. He also named Jasprit Bumrah as the bowler he'd least like to face. Shastri reminisced about his career, highlighting his World Cup win.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/most-influential-of-the-last-decade-former-india-head-coach-ravi-shastri-singles-out-former-india-captain/articleshow/122964686.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/most-influential-of-the-last-decade-former-india-head-coach-ravi-shastri-singles-out-former-india-captain/articleshow/122964686.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 08:48:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="71728" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122964874,imgsize-71728.cms"/></item><item><title>NEP@5: More learners, more women, more languages - But can it deliver on its full promise?</title><description><![CDATA[India's National Education Policy 2020 is showing promising early results, particularly in foundational learning for primary students, where reading and arithmetic skills have seen significant gains, especially in rural areas. Higher education is also experiencing growth, with increased enrollment across various demographics, including women and marginalized communities. However, the policy faces implementation challenges and political resistance, hindering the widespread adoption of some reforms.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/nep5-more-learners-more-women-more-languages-but-can-it-deliver-on-its-full-promise/articleshow/122962219.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/nep5-more-learners-more-women-more-languages-but-can-it-deliver-on-its-full-promise/articleshow/122962219.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 04:48:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>MANASH PRATIM GOHAIN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1678825" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122962238,imgsize-1678825.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG | 'Draw was the goal': Dale Steyn hits out at Jadeja, Sundar for 'free milestones'</title><description><![CDATA[The drawn fourth Test between India and England at Old Trafford saw late-game drama as Ravindra Jadeja and Washington Sundar opted to continue batting despite a handshake offer from Ben Stokes and Harry Brook. Dale Steyn weighed in, suggesting a handshake would have been sportsmanlike once the draw was secured, though he acknowledged the batters' right to pursue milestones.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-test-draw-was-the-goal-dale-steyn-hits-out-at-ravindra-jadeja-washington-sundar-for-chasing-free-milestones/articleshow/122964568.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-test-draw-was-the-goal-dale-steyn-hits-out-at-ravindra-jadeja-washington-sundar-for-chasing-free-milestones/articleshow/122964568.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 08:25:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="126970" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122964536,imgsize-126970.cms"/></item><item><title>Bigg Boss 19: Mallika Sherawat to participate in the reality show?</title><description><![CDATA[An actress has officially denied her participation in Bigg Boss, putting an end to swirling rumors. The show's new promo has sparked excitement, fueling speculation about potential contestants like Dheeraj Dhoopar and Munmun Dutta.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/tv/news/hindi/bigg-boss-19-mallika-sherawat-to-participate-in-the-reality-show-actress-breaks-silence/articleshow/122965461.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/tv/news/hindi/bigg-boss-19-mallika-sherawat-to-participate-in-the-reality-show-actress-breaks-silence/articleshow/122965461.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 09:21:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>etimes.in</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="26104" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122965457,imgsize-26104.cms"/></item><item><title>Terrorist who led Pahalgam attack killed in J&K gunfight</title><description><![CDATA[Indian Army para commandos neutralized Suleiman, the lead perpetrator of the Pahalgam massacre where 26 civilians were killed. The operation, named 'Mahadev', took place in the Dachigam forest area near Srinagar, resulting in the deaths of two more Pakistani terrorists linked to Lashkar-e-Taiba. Suleiman, a former Pakistani special forces commando, was also involved in the 2023 Poonch attack on an Army truck.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/terrorist-who-led-pahalgam-attack-killed-in-jk-gunfight/articleshow/122962606.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/terrorist-who-led-pahalgam-attack-killed-in-jk-gunfight/articleshow/122962606.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 05:19:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>BHARTI JAIN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1208306" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122962641,imgsize-1208306.cms"/></item><item><title>'This plea shouldn’t have been filed': SC to Varma</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court questioned Justice Yashwant Varma's petition challenging the in-house inquiry into the discovery of currency at his residence, noting his participation in the process. The court highlighted that the inquiry report wouldn't be binding on the Lok Sabha's inquiry panel. Additionally, the bench addressed a plea for an FIR against Justice Varma, requesting the inquiry report for review.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/this-plea-shouldnt-have-been-filed-sc-to-varma/articleshow/122962411.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/this-plea-shouldnt-have-been-filed-sc-to-varma/articleshow/122962411.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 05:03:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="161204" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122962536,imgsize-161204.cms"/></item><item><title>London stabbing near Tower bridge: Two dead, two injured including suspect; no terror link suspected</title><description><![CDATA[A stabbing incident in Southwark, central London, near Tower Bridge resulted in the deaths of two men, aged 58 and 27. A man in his 30s was arrested but is in critical condition, while another man sustained non-life-threatening injuries and is hospitalized.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/uk/london-stabbing-near-tower-bridge-two-dead-two-injured-including-suspect-in-knife-attack-no-terror-link-suspected-say-police/articleshow/122963815.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/uk/london-stabbing-near-tower-bridge-two-dead-two-injured-including-suspect-in-knife-attack-no-terror-link-suspected-say-police/articleshow/122963815.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 06:58:01 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="53946" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122964011,imgsize-53946.cms"/></item><item><title>Amid Bihar’s SIR drive, dog gets residence certificate; oppn roasts EC, Nitish govt</title><description><![CDATA[In Bihar, a residence certificate was fraudulently issued to a dog named 'Dog Babu,' raising concerns about the integrity of the state's e-governance systems during the special intensive revision of electoral rolls. The incident, involving misused Aadhaar details, has sparked outrage from the opposition, who allege widespread irregularities in the voter roll revision process. Officials are facing action for negligence in verifying the application.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/dogs-residence-certificate-triggers-political-uproar/articleshow/122957288.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/dogs-residence-certificate-triggers-political-uproar/articleshow/122957288.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 21:37:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>JAINARAIN PANDEY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1312552" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122964004,imgsize-1312552.cms"/></item><item><title>In LS, Rajnath, Jaishankar reject Trump mediation claim as Cong's Gogoi flags it</title><description><![CDATA[In Lok Sabha, the government refuted opposition claims that Operation Sindoor was halted due to US pressure, as alleged by President Trump. Rajnath Singh and S Jaishankar clarified that Pakistan initiated the truce after India achieved its objectives. They emphasized that trade was never linked to the operation in discussions with the US, dismissing the allegations as baseless.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/in-ls-rajnath-jaishankar-reject-trump-mediation-claim-as-congs-gogoi-flags-it/articleshow/122962728.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/in-ls-rajnath-jaishankar-reject-trump-mediation-claim-as-congs-gogoi-flags-it/articleshow/122962728.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 05:28:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="995952" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122962772,imgsize-995952.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Saiyaara': Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda starrer inches closer to Rs 260 crore in India despite a drop </title><description><![CDATA[Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda's 'Saiyaara' continues its strong box office performance into its second week, earning ₹9.50 crore on Monday, bringing its total to ₹256.75 crore in India. Despite a weekday dip, the film has outperformed major Bollywood releases like 'Dunki' and 'Singham Again'.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-11-ahaan-panday-and-aneet-padda-starrer-directed-by-mohit-suri-inches-closer-to-rs-260-crore-in-india-despite-a-drop-on-its-second-monday/articleshow/122963071.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-11-ahaan-panday-and-aneet-padda-starrer-directed-by-mohit-suri-inches-closer-to-rs-260-crore-in-india-despite-a-drop-on-its-second-monday/articleshow/122963071.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 05:58:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32012" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122963067,imgsize-32012.cms"/></item><item><title>Manhattan: Five people, including a police officer, killed in shooting incident; suspect neutralised</title><description><![CDATA[A major shooting in Midtown Manhattan on Monday evening left an NYPD officer and two civilians wounded. A lone gunman opened fire near a corporate building on Park Avenue before being neutralised. The shooter is believed to be dead. One civilian is in critical condition, while the officer and another civilian are expected to survive.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/midtown-manhattan-shooting-police-officer-two-civilians-shot-in-new-york-gunfire-incident-suspect-found-dead-at-345-park-avenue-near-nfl-and-blackstone/articleshow/122963072.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/midtown-manhattan-shooting-police-officer-two-civilians-shot-in-new-york-gunfire-incident-suspect-found-dead-at-345-park-avenue-near-nfl-and-blackstone/articleshow/122963072.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 05:56:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="52218" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122963352,imgsize-52218.cms"/></item><item><title>Ryne Sandberg dies at 65: Chicago Cubs legend battled cancer; MLB world mourns Hall of Famer’s loss</title><description><![CDATA[Baseball legend Ryne Sandberg, affectionately known as “Ryno,” passed away at 65 after battling metastatic prostate cancer. A Chicago Cubs icon, Sandberg starred for over a decade, earning 10 All-Star selections and the 1984 NL MVP award. His Hall of Fame induction in 2005 cemented his legacy. Sandberg's impact extended beyond the field, coaching and inspiring future generations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/chicago-cubs-legend-ryne-sandberg-dies-at-65-after-courageous-cancer-battle/articleshow/122964082.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/chicago-cubs-legend-ryne-sandberg-dies-at-65-after-courageous-cancer-battle/articleshow/122964082.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 07:38:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39708" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122964106,imgsize-39708.cms"/></item><item><title>Maharashtra bars staff from online criticism of government</title><description><![CDATA[The Maharashtra government has issued guidelines restricting state employees' social media use, prohibiting criticism of current or future government policies. Employees are barred from sharing confidential documents without approval and must avoid banned websites and apps. Violations will result in disciplinary action under the Maharashtra Civil Services Rules, emphasizing responsible online conduct and separation of personal and official accounts.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/maharashtra-issues-social-media-guidelines-for-govt-employees-bars-criticism-of-policies/articleshow/122958901.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/maharashtra-issues-social-media-guidelines-for-govt-employees-bars-criticism-of-policies/articleshow/122958901.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 03:42:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PRIYANKA KAKODKAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="26162" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122958901,imgsize-26162.cms"/></item><item><title>Atlanta inventor Julian Brown 'missing' for two weeks; his last post triggers suspense</title><description><![CDATA[Julian Brown, a young inventor from Atlanta, has reportedly disappeared after posting a message about being under attack. Brown is known for 'Plastoline,' a plastic-to-fuel technology. His last social media post hinted at trouble. Social media users expressed concerns about his safety and urged the FBI to investigate. His followers claim that something bad happened to him as he did not post on social media after July 9. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/i-am-certainly-atlanta-inventor-julian-brown-missing-for-two-weeks-his-last-post-triggers-suspense/articleshow/122953942.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/i-am-certainly-atlanta-inventor-julian-brown-missing-for-two-weeks-his-last-post-triggers-suspense/articleshow/122953942.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 17:27:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="55216" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122953932,imgsize-55216.cms"/></item><item><title>US scientists find that lifestyle changes like diet, exercise can help reduce dementia risk</title><description><![CDATA[A recent study, involving over 2,100 adults, reveals that consistent lifestyle changes significantly improve cognitive function in older adults. Participants who followed a structured program with coaching, exercise, and a brain-friendly diet showed noticeable improvements in mental sharpness. This highlights the importance of structured interventions for maintaining cognitive health as we age, as opposed to self-guided approaches. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/dementia-us-scientists-find-that-lifestyle-changes-like-diet-exercise-can-help-reduce-dementia-risk/articleshow/122963801.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/dementia-us-scientists-find-that-lifestyle-changes-like-diet-exercise-can-help-reduce-dementia-risk/articleshow/122963801.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 06:55:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="733962" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122963798,imgsize-733962.cms"/></item><item><title>SIR in Bihar: Accept Aadhaar along with voter ID, SC tells EC</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court has directed the Election Commission to accept Aadhaar and EPIC for voter authentication during the Special Intensive Revision (SIR) of electoral rolls. The court emphasized that the SIR should focus on broad inclusion rather than exclusion. While rejecting a stay on the SIR, the court agreed to daily hearings for a swift resolution.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sir-in-bihar-accept-aadhaar-along-with-voter-id-sc-tells-ec/articleshow/122961065.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sir-in-bihar-accept-aadhaar-along-with-voter-id-sc-tells-ec/articleshow/122961065.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 02:34:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="161204" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122961069,imgsize-161204.cms"/></item><item><title>From September 2, US visa interview waiver only in special cases</title><description><![CDATA[The US has tightened its non-immigrant visa norms, requiring in-person interviews for most applicants, including those under 14 and over 79, starting September 2nd. Exceptions exist for B-1, B-2, B1/B2 visa renewals within 12 months of expiration, provided certain criteria are met. Consular officers retain the right to mandate interviews on a case-by-case basis, impacting wait times which vary across Indian cities.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/from-september-2-us-visa-interview-waiver-only-in-special-cases/articleshow/122963409.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/from-september-2-us-visa-interview-waiver-only-in-special-cases/articleshow/122963409.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 06:20:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="766134" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122963440,imgsize-766134.cms"/></item><item><title>Tom Brady backs son’s hoop dreams: Hints Michigan recruitment after viral dunk video</title><description><![CDATA[Tom Brady, now retired, is proudly showcasing his children's talents, particularly his son Benjamin's basketball skills, even hinting at a future Wolverine. While Benjamin explores both football and his artistic side, Brady's eldest, Jack, is also making his mark in sports, strengthening their bond. Brady embraces his children's diverse interests, supporting their individual paths.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/tom-brady-hopes-michigan-basketball-recruits-his-son-after-viral-clip-shows-next-gen-athleticism/articleshow/122956627.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/tom-brady-hopes-michigan-basketball-recruits-his-son-after-viral-clip-shows-next-gen-athleticism/articleshow/122956627.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 05:48:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="65770" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122956864,imgsize-65770.cms"/></item><item><title>Rajnath Singh: Operation Sindoor achieved objective, was then 'paused'</title><description><![CDATA[Defence Minister Rajnath Singh defended Operation Sindoor in Lok Sabha, stating its objective was to punish Pakistan for proxy terrorism by eliminating terror nurseries, and it was paused after achieving desired results, not due to US pressure. The opposition criticized the government for halting the operation and demanded accountability for security lapses in Pahalgam and clarification on downed Indian jets, questioning the operation's success and the delay in reclaiming PoK.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rajnath-singh-operation-sindoor-achieved-objective-was-then-paused/articleshow/122960966.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rajnath-singh-operation-sindoor-achieved-objective-was-then-paused/articleshow/122960966.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 01:38:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="954619" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122960978,imgsize-954619.cms"/></item><item><title>Killing of terrorist who led Pahalgam strike blunts opposition's attack in House</title><description><![CDATA[Just before the Operation Sindoor debate, the killing of three alleged terrorists near Srinagar, including Suleiman, the suspected mastermind of the Pahalgam massacre, seemingly deflated the opposition's planned criticism of the government's counterterrorism efforts. Despite this development, SP's Ramashankar Rajbhar questioned the delay in arresting those responsible for the Pahalgam attack, even as BJP's Baijyant Panda celebrated the news of Suleiman's death during Operation Mahadev.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/killing-of-terrorist-who-led-pahalgam-strike-blunts-oppositions-attack-in-house/articleshow/122960982.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/killing-of-terrorist-who-led-pahalgam-strike-blunts-oppositions-attack-in-house/articleshow/122960982.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 01:46:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1822989" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122960984,imgsize-1822989.cms"/></item><item><title>LA Lakers add Villanova’s 6-foot-8 all-time scorer to support Luka-LeBron power duo</title><description><![CDATA[Los Angeles Lakers have signed Eric Dixon, Villanova's top scorer, along with RJ Davis, Arthur Kaluma, and Augustas Marčiulionis. Dixon's signing was delayed due to a foot injury. He is known for his scoring ability. The Lakers aim to build depth around LeBron James and Luka Doncic. Dixon may start in the G-League.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/nba-trade-news-los-angeles-lakers-add-villanovas-6-foot-8-all-time-scorer-to-support-luka-lebron-power-duo-and-improve-title-odds/articleshow/122963309.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/nba-trade-news-los-angeles-lakers-add-villanovas-6-foot-8-all-time-scorer-to-support-luka-lebron-power-duo-and-improve-title-odds/articleshow/122963309.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 06:15:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAUNAK BOSE</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31046" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122963346,imgsize-31046.cms"/></item><item><title>At no stage of talks with US was trade tied to Sindoor, says EAM</title><description><![CDATA[External Affairs Minister Jaishankar defended India's global outreach following the Pahalgam attack, asserting overwhelming international support and dismissing claims of policy failure. He highlighted backing from Quad, Brics, and the UNSC, emphasizing India's right to defend against cross-border terrorism. Jaishankar also criticized past Congress actions and defended his China visit for de-escalation talks.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/at-no-stage-of-talks-with-us-was-trade-tied-to-sindoor-eam-s-jaishankar/articleshow/122960994.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/at-no-stage-of-talks-with-us-was-trade-tied-to-sindoor-eam-s-jaishankar/articleshow/122960994.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 01:52:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="969994" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122960999,imgsize-969994.cms"/></item><item><title>Doctor asleep, man 'bleeds to death' in Meerut hospital</title><description><![CDATA[A junior resident doctor at Lala Lajpat Rai Memorial Medical College in Meerut has been suspended following allegations of negligence. The doctor allegedly failed to attend to a 30-year-old accident victim, Sunil Kumar, who later died from his injuries while waiting for treatment. An investigation has been launched into the incident after a video surfaced showing the doctor seemingly asleep while Kumar's family pleaded for help.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/doctor-asleep-man-bleeds-to-death-in-meerut-hospital/articleshow/122961154.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/doctor-asleep-man-bleeds-to-death-in-meerut-hospital/articleshow/122961154.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 03:15:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>KRISHNA CHOUDHURY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="737013" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122961317,imgsize-737013.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[Rare earth element (REE) reserves have been identified in Madhya Pradesh’s Singrauli coalfields, Parliament was told. Coal India is conducting R&D for REE extraction.       <title><![CDATA[Genius Act gives legitimacy boost to stablecoins, says Cornell’s Eswar Prasad]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/cryptocurrency/genius-act-stablecoins-legalisation-cryptocurrencies-eswar-prasad-19644875.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The Genius Act marks a turning point for stablecoins, offering them legal legitimacy and regulatory clarity. “This legitimisation of stablecoins is certainly going to give a huge boost,” says Eswar Prasad, Professor at Cornell University. With major players like Tether and USD Coin already surpassing $200 billion in market cap, the Act is expected to accelerate adoption and open doors for private issuers like Amazon and Walmart.]]></description>

      <title><![CDATA[SuperK to use ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen presence in small-town India]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/retail-startup-superk-series-b-funding-expansion-small-town-india-19644892.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK. The value-led retail chain, backed by Binny Bansal and Shubman Gill, will invest in team, tech, and brand-building to scale its small-town retail ecosystem.]]></description>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>
      <guid><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></guid>
      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2021/03/IndiaUS_flag.jpg"/>
    </item>

      <description><![CDATA[Mphasis is targeting growth at twice the industry rate, driven by a record $760 million in Q1 deal wins and a strong AI-led pipeline.       <description><![CDATA[Sources say the company is likely to file its updated Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) as early as tomorrow or by the end of this week.       <title><![CDATA[IREDA to stay focused on renewables; eyes more QIP as e-mobility recovery picks up]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/ireda-renewable-energy-focus-qip-fundraise-asset-quality-gensol-andhra-ppa-19640515.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[IREDA will remain exclusively focused on the renewable energy sector, with no plans to diversify, CMD Pradip Kumar Das told CNBC-TV18. He said the agency is maintaining a balanced portfolio mix and has already raised ₹2,005 crore through QIP, with more fundraising planned. Das also addressed the Gensol case, calling it a result of “promoters’ misgovernance,” but expressed confidence in recovery. Despite sectoral challenges like the Andhra PPA issue, IREDA’s asset quality remains strong, with only ₹135 crore in cumulative write-offs over 38 years.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 21 Jul 2025 16:18:19 +0530]]></pubDate>
